SQLFunctionSpec.Name: UFN_UMHS_REFERRERPLANSUMMARY
SQLFunctionSpec.Author: UM Dev
SQLFunctionSpec.CreateFunctionSQL:
CREATE function dbo.UFN_UMHS_REFERRERPLANSUMMARY() returns table as return ( select U.ID, U.CONSTITUENTID, ( select max(ACTUALDATE) from dbo.PROSPECTPLAN PP inner join dbo.USR_UMHS_INTERACTION I on I.PROSPECTPLANID=PP.ID where PP.PROSPECTID=C.ID ) LASTSTEP, case when PP.ISACTIVE = 1 and datediff(day,( select max(ACTUALDATE) from dbo.PROSPECTPLAN PP inner join dbo.USR_UMHS_INTERACTION I on I.PROSPECTPLANID=PP.ID where PP.PROSPECTID=C.ID ),getdate())>=90 then 'RES:warning' else '' end NORECENT, ( select min(I.EXPECTEDDATE) from PROSPECTPLAN PP inner join dbo.USR_UMHS_INTERACTION I on I.PROSPECTPLANID=PP.ID where PP.PROSPECTID=C.ID and I.ID = dbo.UFN_PROSPECTPLAN_GETNEXTSTEP(PP.ID) and I.COMPLETED=0 ) NEXTSTEP, NF.NAME, U.KEYNAME, C.NAME REFERRER, UCR.DESCRIPTION REFERRERROLE, -- UR.[UMHSDEVSTAFFASSIGNMENTDATE] ASSIGNMENTDATE, DBO.USR_UFN_UMHS_INTERACTION_GETSITELIST(I.ID) AS SITES
from dbo.USR_UMHS_DATA U --INNER JOIN dbo.USR_UMHS_CONNECTION UC on UC.UMHSID = U.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.USR_UMHS_REFERRAL UR on UR.UMHSID = U.ID LEFT JOIN CONSTITUENT C ON C.ID = UR.REFERRERID LEFT JOIN DBO.USR_UMHS_REFERRERROLECODE UCR ON UR.[REFERRERROLECODEID] = UCR.ID left join dbo.USR_UMHS_INTERACTION I on I.PROSPECTPLANID = C.ID left outer join dbo.PROSPECTPLAN PP on PP.PROSPECTID=C.ID outer apply dbo.USR_UFN_UMHS_DISPLAYNAME(U.ID) NF where dbo.UFN_CONSTITUENT_ISPROSPECT(C.ID) = 1 )
